mapper.sql: id, appid, voice_size, voice_name, voice_url, status, common, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into tb_app_voice (id, appid, voice_size, voice_url, status, common, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voiceSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tb_app_voice
appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voice_size = #{voiceSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
common = #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_app_voice set appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voice_size = #{voiceSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, common = #{common,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.mobile ,a.sid,c.name,b.app_name from tb_user_admin a ,tb_app_info b ,tb_user_admin_authen_company c where a.sid=b.sid and a.uid = c.uid and b.appid = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select common from tb_app_voice where appid = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
